entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
